title: Tadej Pogačar’s Colnago TT1 Time Trial Bike Is for Sale – And It’s Expected to Fetch €30,000
content:
How much will this 1 of 4 time trial bike cost? We'll find out in the auction.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar’s Colnago TT1 Time Trial Bike Is for Sale – And It’s Expected to Fetch €30,000 on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
